Butler.synopsis: Dark Urge Butler's dialogue after it's in camp.

Butler_AD_Help.synopsis: Butler jumps in to help the Dark Urge in combat.
Butler_AD_Help.how_to_trigger: Not currently triggered in the game, added in case we need it.

Butler_AD_AttackedNPC.how_to_trigger: Not currently triggered in the game, added in case we need it.

LootCorpse.synopsis: Narrator reminds Dark Urge of their origin story the first time they loot a corpse.
LootCorpse.how_to_trigger: Start the game as Dark Urge Avatar.Go to WLD_Main_A.Loot any body.

PAD_SeesDUBecomeSlayer.synopsis: Companions sees the Dark Urge turn into the slayer.

Butler_9.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_9.text: That last run must have been the shortest time any Sceleritas lived! Can you beat the record?

Butler_12.speaker: Narrator
Butler_12.text: *Sceleritas seems unable to speak, ever since you commanded him not to.*

Butler_132.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_132.text: MMn- ahh. Oh, forgive my negligence! I entreat - don't do that to me again!

Butler_85.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_85.context: NodeContext: VERY PAINED AT THE INSULT

Butler_14.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_14.text: My fondest congratulations for your work in the Temple!

Butler_32.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_32.text: Well done! Well done indeed! On this eve, Sceleritas gazes upon perfection.

Butler_71.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_71.text: You shall be a graven God, my demiurge. All you must do now is heed your Father's advice when the time comes.

Butler_27.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_27.text: Not half as much as the world over will fear you.

Butler_111.speaker: Player
Butler_111.text: I shall bring a bloody storm upon this city, in Bhaal's name.

Butler_0.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_0.text: In the carnage to come, you shall reach the peak of your holy magnificence.

Butler_34.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_34.text: It won't be long, Master... It won't be long.

Butler_122.speaker: Player
Butler_122.text: I could not have become Bhaal's Chosen without you.

Butler_47.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_47.text: I shall engrave that compliment on my heart.

Butler_134.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_134.text: But you should rest, Master, you must be tired from all the sororicide!

Butler_38.speaker: Player
Butler_38.text: You turned into Bhaal! How did you survive?

Butler_36.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_36.text: Survive? I did not! it was my favourite death yet!

Butler_117.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_117.text: As he does each time I expire by your side, Bhaal has sent you another loyal Sceleritas, to watch over and adore you.

Butler_64.speaker: Player
Butler_64.text: Begone! I don't need you any more!

Butler_6.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_6.text: M-Master... You speak the truth. You became his Chosen, and will go on to even greater deeds.

Butler_100.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_100.text: But if you don't need me, I shall perish. Once and for all.

Butler_7.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_7.text: I live to serve, as your Father made me. If I cannot serve...

Butler_115.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_115.text: Don't make me go, Master! Please!
Butler_115.context: CinematicNodeContext: Crying, pained, incredibly sadNodeContext: Sniffling, crying

Butler_42.speaker: Player
Butler_42.text: Perhaps you will be of use, still.

Butler_68.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_68.text: Oh, thank you, thank you! You shall not regret this, godly villain!

Butler_123.speaker: Player
Butler_123.text: A Bhaalspawn can have no friends.

Butler_57.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_57.text: A friend? You considered me 'a friend'?

Butler_90.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_90.text: If this is how it must be... Goodbye, Master.

Butler_28.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_28.text: Being in your service was an honour.

Butler_125.context: CinematicNodeContext: Butler explodes using his butler spontaneous death animation he's had before. This time, once and for all.

Butler_20.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_20.text: Mmmmn. Oh. OH. That was euphoric. You're even better than you used to be.

Butler_135.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_135.text: Please kill me any time it takes your fancy: if I may be so bold.

Butler_23.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_23.text: Oh Master, I wish you could stand brutalising me forever.

Butler_26.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_26.text: How dare you? My life is my Master's alone to steal.

Butler_63.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_63.text: Master, you spoil me so. You have murdered me so sweetly time and time again.

Butler_78.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_78.text: But I worry you are distracted from your glory. There are others to kill besides me!

Butler_67.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_67.text: This is getting rather silly, my Liege. But I am enjoying myself.

Butler_69.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_69.text: Hee hee! Sceleritas is back again!

Butler_70.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_70.text: Your command is my wish. Your demand is my desire.

Butler_24.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_24.text: Inquisite me. What do you wish to know of?

Butler_129.speaker: Player
Butler_129.text: Bhaal told me I will rule, how do I achieve that?

Butler_107.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_107.text: Your tedious sister believed she was ending you when she drilled the wee tadpole-cavern in your head.

Butler_39.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_39.text: You were merely reborn... with a silver spoon in your brain.

Butler_131.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_131.text: The first to be tadpoled. The first above all men. I hope you are taking advantage of the worm: it will lead you to rule.

Butler_19.speaker: Player
Butler_19.text: Will my Urges grow stronger, now Bhaal has such a hold over me?

Butler_108.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_108.text: You and the Urge are wedded, now. One body, one mind.

Butler_112.speaker: Player
Butler_112.text: When I bring ruin to the world, will Bhaal allow me to spare my beloved?

Butler_45.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_45.text: Of course, Master! We will always need to sire more Bhaalspawn!

Butler_44.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_44.text: It appears that may be already underway. The drow is a fecund choice of mate. Well done!

Butler_66.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_66.text: Hopefully the near-slaughter of your partner taught them the wisdom of obeying your every command.

Butler_82.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_82.text: Although if they are not up to the task we may need to find you a breeding-mate. Or ten.

Butler_55.speaker: Player
Butler_55.text: Can I ever get my memories back?

Butler_10.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_10.text: My dear genderless champion... you are the hero of a sad tale.

Butler_80.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_80.text: You do not have a charm placed upon you to clear your memory-stores, nor an enchantment befuddling you.

Butler_105.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_105.text: Orin dug, Orin scooped, Orin dissected. Your brain is damaged forever.

Butler_114.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_114.text: But don't fret, I still think you're very clever. Despite your, ahem, little problem.

Butler_88.speaker: Player
Butler_88.text: Can you tell me the worst thing I ever did?

Butler_84.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_84.text: There was one time you gave a beggar some coin while we were en route to the Devil's Fee.

Butler_61.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_61.text: You didn't kick him or spit on him or anything! I was so shocked I almost fainted!

Butler_130.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_130.text: I still have nightmares about it to this day. But I'm sure you only did so to lower the suspicions of the Flaming Fist. Surely?

Butler_133.speaker: Player
Butler_133.text: Did I live my whole life in the Temple of Bhaal?

Butler_97.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_97.text: Orin was born and raised in the Temple, but you spent many years on your own before you found your way back home.

Butler_109.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_109.text: Hence you have such diverse talents. But you were awful from the very first day you set foot amongst the ichored altars.

Butler_102.speaker: Player
Butler_102.text: Who was my mother, if Bhaal was my Father?

Butler_52.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_52.text: Bhaal gave out all of his seed long ago, in the time of Sarevok.

Butler_94.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_94.text: You were not conceived. Bhaal sculpted you from a drop of his own gore.

Butler_56.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_56.text: No Bhaalspawn has ever borne the Urge, the holy guarantee of murder. It was woven into your blood alone.

Butler_43.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_43.text: Orin was not special. She was but a grandchild of an aged Bhaalspawn. A mere weed of Bhaal's loins.

Butler_54.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_54.text: Oh no! There are far more important matters at hand. But if you must waste time thinking of your Butler, I will attend to your curiosity.

Butler_89.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_89.text: I am but a table-scrap of Bhaal's will. He will send me to aid and protect you, until you have need of me no more.

Butler_87.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_87.text: As long as there have been Bhaalspawn, there have been Butlers, but Bhaal only makes them for the children he has use of.

Butler_98.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_98.text: Now, as you are the last true recipient of your Father's blessing, I suspect I am the last living Butler.

Butler_5.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_5.text: I was sent to guide you to your birthright, on the day my vile Liege reached their age of majority.

Butler_49.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_49.text: I hope we will stay together, always.

Butler_93.speaker: Player
Butler_93.text: How did you end up serving me, and not Orin?

Butler_22.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_22.text: Me? Serve Orin? I shall be sick! Fetch the Bucket of Bhaal!

Butler_53.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_53.text: Orin had her own Butler, who she insolently killed on his first visit, claiming she didn't need him to follow Bhaal.

Butler_4.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_4.text: Poor Cruor, never stood a chance.

Butler_29.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_29.text: The only way for a Butler to die is if we are not of use to our Master. But you have always needed abundant assistance.

Butler_76.speaker: Player
Butler_76.text: Why are you at rest? Start cleaning the camp!

Butler_104.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_104.text: Aaah! Master! I'm sorry, I'm ever-so sorry to forget my other duties! What a wretch I am! I'm not even worthy of being your scullery maid.
Butler_104.context: NodeContext: Startled, realises he has done poorly

Butler_95.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_95.text: At once. I will shatter some glasses and sprinkle the fragments in the beds of your other followers. Keep their dreams bloody.

Butler_8.speaker: Player
Butler_8.text: I jest, cleaning is beneath my chief manservant.

Butler_17.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_17.text: I shall attend to your miserable royal person with great care. You shall be well-groomed with my tincy talons. Yes, yes.

Butler_25.speaker: Player
Butler_25.text: Cease your chattering! A Butler of mine will not speak unless spoken to!

Butler_60.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_60.text: Wait, Master, if you ask me to- Mmmpfh!
Butler_60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halfway through the sentence the butler's mouth snaps shut.NodeContext: Panicked

Butler_77.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_77.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mouth shut, trying to talkNodeContext: Making noises through a closed mouth - cannot talk

Butler_127.speaker: Player
Butler_127.text: I want to thank you for all your help.

Butler_37.speaker: Player
Butler_37.text: I have no further use for you, begone!

Butler_75.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_75.text: Hello, you must be one of Master's other servants.

Butler_33.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_33.text: Why they chose to take one such as yourself as a retainer is beyond me.

Butler_106.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_106.text: Know that I love them best.

Butler_35.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_35.text: Your presence will be tolerated in their company, if you do not interfere with their holy destiny.

Butler_1.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_1.text: The beady eye of tiny Sceleritas is upon you, do not forget that.

Butler_86.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_86.context: NodeContext: ANGRILY but can't express it because silenced

Butler_92.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_92.text: Oh, my pustulating godhead! Why do you degrade yourself, wearing the shameful hatpiece of a mere servant?

Butler_116.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_116.text: It is an honour to see you look so fetching, but let me dress you properly on the morrow.

Butler_110.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_110.text: Away! Attend to your duties! Lazy little maid you are!

Butler_118.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_118.text: I love you when you hurt me, Master.

Butler_119.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_119.context: NodeContext: Happily and satisfied after being killed

Butler_AD_Help_0.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_AD_Help_0.text: Allow your humble Butler to assist you!

Butler_AD_AttackedNPC_0.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_AD_AttackedNPC_0.text: You're lucky! You get to be killed by the Master!

Butler_AD_AttackedNonDU_0.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Butler_AD_AttackedNonDU_0.text: Only the Master is allowed to hurt me like that!

LootCorpse_12.speaker: Narrator
LootCorpse_12.text: *Since you awoke on the ship, your mind has been cold and empty. But something stirs, with your hands close to this body.*

LootCorpse_10.speaker: Narrator
LootCorpse_10.text: *You know nothing of why. But you find a half-smile flittering across your face.*

LootCorpse_1.speaker: Narrator
LootCorpse_1.text: Let the grin fall across your face.

LootCorpse_0.speaker: Narrator
LootCorpse_0.text: *There is something unknown and unspeakable, deep within your heart.*

LootCorpse_13.speaker: Narrator
LootCorpse_13.text: Push the smile away. This is vile.

LootCorpse_7.speaker: Narrator
LootCorpse_7.text: *With a shake of your head, you can hear your own blood throbbing in your ears.*

LootCorpse_2.text: Try to remember the last time you stood above a corpse.

LootCorpse_14.speaker: Narrator
LootCorpse_14.text: *As soon as you delve into your mind, it is filled with flashes of a thousand different dead.*

LootCorpse_6.speaker: Narrator
LootCorpse_6.text: *You see flashes of flesh, all lumped together in a mass grave. No single image sticks out.*

LootCorpse_5.text: Try to remember the last time you stood above a corpse.

PAD_SeesDUBecomeSlayer_0.speaker: Player
PAD_SeesDUBecomeSlayer_0.text: It's too late, then. You really are the Slayer.
